title: About
text:
This blog acts as a Joycean stream-of-consciousness record of the random tech-y things I’m experimenting with and learning. The purpose is to prevent things falling out of my goldfish brain. If you’re reading this, I hope it benefits you too, though there’s certainly no guarantee.
Please visit my website or LinkedIn for a slightly more professional persona.
